subject: Issue with pedals ingame
description_text:
Hello,

I’m reaching out because I’m having ongoing issues with my Simsonn pedals
not being detected correctly in games after some driver problems.

Initially, the pedals were working, but after trying to reinstall or adjust
drivers, they stopped showing up in my sim (F1 25) and were not appearing
correctly in Windows Game Controllers. I was eventually able to get the
firmware reinstalled and the pedals are now visible in the Simsonn software
again and responding normally there, but they are still not appearing as
usable inputs in games.

Here are the troubleshooting steps I’ve already attempted:

   -

   Verified the pedals show up in *Device Manager* under USB devices.
   -

   Checked driver status and attempted reinstall/update.
   -

   Tried connecting the pedals directly to the motherboard USB ports and
   also through a powered USB hub (the cable will not reach the PC otherwise).
   -

   Reinstalled firmware using the supplied tool.
   -

   Restarted the PC multiple times after each change.
   -

   Checked Windows Game Controllers (joy.cpl), but the pedals do not show
   up as a calibratable device there.
   -

   Confirmed that the Simsonn software detects the pedals correctly and
   shows full input movement.

The issue now is that even though the pedals work inside your software,
Windows and my racing sims do not recognize them as a game controller/input
device.

Could you please advise on the next steps or provide guidance on how to
fully reinstall/reset the drivers so that Windows can properly detect the
pedals again?

Thank you for your help — I really enjoy the pedals and just want to get
them working correctly again.

Best regards,
Christian Lowery

conversations.body_text: 你好，克里斯蒂安·洛厄里，     Hello, here is the setup guide for using the SIMSONN Plus X pedals in F1 25:    First time entering the game    You may see a message:   NO PRESET CONTROL SCHEME FOR DEVICE(S) SIMSONN Plus X Please customise your controls in the Settings Menu...     Click Okay to continue.      Bind controls and save a new scheme    Go to Settings → Controls to bind pedals and buttons.    When exiting, select Save as new Control Scheme, give it a name (e.g., SIMSONN), and click Save.      Manage and switch control schemes    Main Menu → Settings → Controls → Control Scheme List    Your SIMSONN scheme will appear; you can select it directly for future use.       ? Note: If you delete the scheme without backup, you will need to repeat the binding and saving process.     After completing these steps, your pedals will work properly in the game, providing a realistic driving experience.
